added:
âš¡ï¸ Yooo. Thanks for adding me, I'm HeXaDeX. My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot, so I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 
 
/start: Command list 
/dex PokemonName: Get information about that PokÃ©mon 
/usage: Get current VGC usage on PokÃ©mon Showdown 
/addcode YourFC: Add your Friend Code in my database 
/mycode: Show your FC 
/newraid PokemonName: Find partners for a new Raid 
/faq: FAQ â“
/about: Informations about me â˜º
faq: â“ FAQ Q: What is HeXaDeX? A: updated pokedex made by @Bharath_boy, which is a bot which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokemon, Showdown usage and organize Raids as quickly as possible, without ever leaving the app Q: How to get Pokemon informations? A: Just write Pokemon name after /data command (e.g.: /data Rotom) Q: What is /newraid command for? A: With /newraid command you can find friends in the chat that will help you beat the Raid. It isn't an hacked Raids generator! Once you've found enough people, you can close the Raid, Rotomgram will generate a random password visible only to participants Q: What are /addcode and /mycode commands for? A: With /addcode you can register your Nintendo Switch Friend Code in the bot. It will be shown in /newraid command next to your name, so it's easier for other people add you in the Friend List and begin a Raid. /mycode just show your Friend Code (if it's registered) THANKS FOR SUPPORT US
